meanings.definition: A type of antipsychotic medication used to treat schizophrenia and other mental disorders.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed haloperidols to help manage the symptoms of schizophrenia.
meanings.sent2: Patients with mental disorders may benefit from taking haloperidols as part of their treatment.
meanings.sent3: When the haloperidols kicked in, the patient started seeing unicorns in the hospital hallway.
meanings.sent4: The effect of haloperidols on the mind is like a calming wave washing over turbulent thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The image of haloperidols as tiny warriors fighting against the chaos of mental illness stuck with me.
